data.subject: Signs of Life
data.lyric:
Those cool kids
 Stuck in the past
 Apartments of cigarette ash
 Wait outside until it begins
 Won't

data.subject: Creature Comfort
data.lyric:
Some boys hate themselves
 Spend their lives
 resenting their fathers
 Some girls hate their bodies

data.subject: Everything Now
data.lyric:
Every inch of sky's got a star
 Every inch of skin's got a scar
 I guess that you've got 
 everythin
